Name: MONEY LOVES SILENCE
About the game: One day the past will come knocking and you’ll have to open the door. The fate of other characters rests in your hands. Take on the role of a “Tellman & Brothers” bank employee. Find a strategy for each problematic debtor, study that person’s info, and get to work. Recruit your “business partners” from the collection agency. Determine how they talk to clients or let them decide how to do things on their own. You need to earn $580,000 in 12 days for your daughter’s operation. Her life depends on your actions. The task isn’t quite that simple: Your income is based on the number of people who pay off their debts. If you choose the wrong strategy for a client, then (best case scenario) you may earn N-O-T-H-I-N-G or you might even acquire some new problems. Extra income is always a good thing. Buy all the supplies needed and prepare carefully to fulfill the order. Use your personal skills (or whatever else you’ve got) and your intuition to solve problems. This world awaits your arrival. Answer its call! And remember the most important rule of all - “Money Loves Silence”!
